author: Chris Gudea
comment: As state by the other review, the watch battery percentage is cut off on the moto 360. Also the phone battery level is not properly updated; it just mirrors the watch battery level
title: Elegant but not quite there

author: Andreas Varsakopoulos
comment: The watch battery indicator is cut off by the moto 360 bottom. Either omit or reposition please.
title: Excellent face, moto 360 cutoff
